boardgame.description: GiftTRAP won a special Spiel des Jahres prize in 2009, and was voted _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Best Party Game of the Year_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; by Games Magazine in 2008, proving that while buying real gifts can be traumatic, giving virtual gifts to find out how people really feel is heaps of fun. Be prepared for some surprises!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It's a conversation starter that will get you and your friends talking about things that matter. Unlike other party games you don't need skills in drawing, acting or trivia, so it works well when you have a crowd of mixed ages/skills._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;GiftTRAP is played over a series of rounds. Each round has the following steps:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; DEAL - deal random gifts from one of the 5 packs of gifts. Packs have similar monetary value._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; SHOP - think about how to match these gifts to the players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; GIVE - give one of these gifts to each player (using gift tokens)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; GET - choose which gifts you want yourself (using get tokens: Ok, Good, Great _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; No Way)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; REVEAL - show people what you wanted and see what you were given by each player._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; SCORE - the giver and the receiver score for each gift (the giver gets GIVING points, the receiver gets GETTING points). _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The first to reach the end of both the Giving and Getting tracks is the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This game is brand new and manufacturer sealed. Combined shipping may be available on multiple purchases. Other shipping arrangements are available upon request but may vary in cost. Pennsylvania shipping addresses should include 6% sales tax. **VERY FAST SHIPPING - 2-4 business days once payment received**
Brand new, sealed.
We only sell brand new, shrinkwrapped games. International shipping available. Edition: GiftTRAP Enterprises (2006) GFT001
Brand new

Brand new and factory sealed! Gamers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Inn is a real store in Mesa AZ, and will ship via DHL Ground or the USPS. Most games will ship for $7.50 unless it is particularly light or heavy, or if you request Priority or special handling. Insurance is available on all orders for about $2. All games can ship international, and we will quote costs upon request. Delivery confirmation goes with every order. We do our best to give an accurate description of condition, and will ship them safely and quickly, and we will gladly combine shipping costs. In store pickup _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; payment is available with no shipping or handling charges. Arizona residents must pay 7.5% sales tax. About us: We can be reached at: info@gamersinnaz.com The store is open 24/7/365 and can be phoned at: 480-507-0509 Street address: 1232 E Southern Ave, Mesa, AZ 85204 You can check out our history as a Power Seller on eBay at: http://myworld.ebay.com/gamers_inn or on Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/gp/shops/index.html/104-7806078-3093525?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;sellerID=A2M6J42JR1XQD Our home page: http://www.gamersinnaz.com
In shrink.

GiftTRAP (GFT 003) GiftTRAP (GFT 002) California Please contact us with which game you want. Hottest Party Game of the Year GiftTRAP is the Secret Santa of Board Games. Exchanging gifts has never been so much fun. If you’ve never created and shared your “Bucket List” with your friends and family this game is for you. More than a dozen international awards let you know this game is a great time waiting to happen. It’s got great replay value and a very broad appeal. Search the web for hundreds of independent reviews supporting the reputation of this highly innovative and unique game. It’s the hilarious social conversation starter that will get you and your friends talking “off topic” about all sorts of stuff. Build, share and compare your own personal “Bucket List” as you play. Despite there being hundreds of party games, it’s rare to find one that adults and children both LOVE playing. Unlike other party games you don’t need skills in drawing, acting or trivia so it works well when you have a crowd of mixed ages/skills. Winning praise and attention globally
_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Best Party Game 2008” - Games Magazine _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Game of the Year 2007” - Faidutti.com _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Best Party Game 2009” - “Creative Child Magazine_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Seal of Approval” - “The National Parenting Center_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Winner - Best Products 2007” - “Dr Toy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Top 5 Major Fun Party Games 2006” - Majorfun.com _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Les Trois Coeurs” Jeux Soc - Franois Haffner Tipped as “Top 10 Board Game News 2006” - Yehuda Voted “Best Game from a new Publisher” - Boardgame Podcasters Awards Featured in “Good Gift Game Guides 2006” - Seattle Morning News _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Top Ten Games for 2006” - Chicago Tribune _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The best party game since Craniumt” - Brett Spill Guiden Norwegian TV Award - TV2 Hjelper Deg Critical Gamers “2007 Holiday Gift Guide_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; GiftTRAP : California Edition Celebrate the diversity of life in California. Explore some of the 180 gift ideas located in/around California. The game includes a total of 640 gift ideas making sure that its still a great game you can play anywhere.
Played once; still in excellent condition. Gifttrap Enterprises 2006.

Hi there! Up for sale is GiftTRAP. I have limited closet space and need to sell some games. These are games that are in near-new condition, never been played. The theme didnt click with my gaming group, so we never actually played it. They come from a smoke-free, adult home with no kids and no pets. I take absolute meticulous care of all my board games. I do not allow friends to eat and drink while playing these games. Hopefully they can find a home in your inventory where they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be played and loved :) I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m new to BGG, so I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have much feedback, but you can check my eBay account (x.metal), which has over 820 feedback with no negatives. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll combine shipping for multiple items. Send me a geekmail if you have any questions. Thanks for looking!
